title: Alan Gee
deck: I am husband to Steph and dad to Tom and Annie, and work for an electronics company in Saltaire, near Bradford. Steph and I lead a Lifegroup together. As a charity, Gateway has a team of trustees of which I am the Chair. In my spare time I love reading and catching up on old Doctor Who episodes on telly.
titleRole: Lifegroup Leader, Cluster Leader and Chair of Trustees
